makiatto.name: makiatto
makiatto.description: Makiatto is a SSR Sniper Rifle user that priortises dealing single-target DPS while intercepting enemies' attacks. She's very flexiable and fits into many different teams.

basic_attack.name: lone_wolf_territory
basic_attack.description: Selects 1 enemy target within <hl>9 tiles</hl> and deals physical damage equal to <hl>80%</hl> of attack to them.

skill_1.name: cold_precision_shot
skill_1.description: Selects 1 enemy target within <hl>9 tiles</hl> and deals <el freeze>Freeze damage</el> equal to <hl>160%</hl> of attack. Increases the critical damage of this attack by <hl>30%.</hl> Gains <hl>1 stack</hl> of <ef>Cold Conviction</ef> for each instance of damage dealt.
skill_1.quote: Pull the trigger with absolute confidence in victory!

levels.description: Perform two attacks, critical damage will no longer increase, and the damage dealt is decreased to 100% of attack. If the first attack crits, the critical rate of the second attack is increased by 100%, and the critical damage is increased by 80%.

skill_2.name: professional_tactics
skill_2.description: Select 1 enemy target within <hl>9 tiles</hl> of self, deal physical damage equal to <hl>130%</hl> of attack, gain <hl>4 points</hl> of Confectance Index, and gain <hl>2 stacks</hl> of <ef>Standard Approach</ef>.
skill_2.quote: Understanding how to deliver a lethal blow and excelling at remaining hidden demonstrates professionalism.

levels.description: Change Standard Approach to Emergency Plan.

ultimate.name: absolute_mental_defense
ultimate.description: Gains <el>Frost Barrier</el> and <el>Alert</el> for <hl>2 turns</el>. The absorption amount of <el>Frost Barrier</el> is equal to <hl>65%</hl> of the initial attack, but cannot exceed <hl>60%</hl> of max HP.
ultimate.quote: D-Don't barge into someone's personal space!

levels.description: The absorption amount of Frost Barrier is increased to 80% of this unit's initial attack, and the cap is increased to 80% of max HP. The number of Interception triggered is increased by 1 time per turn.

The absorption amount of Frost Barrier is increased to 80% of this unit's initial attack, and the cap is increased to 80% of max HP. The number of Interception triggered is increased by 1 time per turn. After using Absolute Mental Defense, gains 2 points of Confectance Index at the end of the action. This effect can be triggered 2 times. Interception can be triggered once more each turn. If the Interception deals a critical hit, gains Rapture for 1 turn.

passive.name: battlefield_insight
passive.description: Increases critical rate by <hl>40%</hl> and reduces critical damage by <hl>10%</hl>. At the start of the turn, if this unit's HP exceeds <hl>80%</hl>, gains <ef>Insight</ef> and <ef>Steady Progress</ef> until the next turn. When attacking a target with <ef>Frozen</ef>, ignores <hl>4 points</hl> of stability index and increases damage dealt to them by <hl>20%</hl>. When attacking a target with <ef>Frigid</ef>, ignores <hl>6 points</hl> of stability index and increases damage dealt to them by <hl>30%</hl>. These effects cannot stack.

levels.description: When dealing Freeze damage to an enemy target with Frozen, increases the stability index ignored to 6 points. When dealing Freeze damage to an enemy target with Frigid, increases stability index ignored to 10 points.

When dealing Freeze damage to an enemy target with Frozen, increases the stability index ignored to 6 points. When dealing Freeze damage to an enemy target with Frigid, increases stability index ignored to 10 points. When dealing Freeze damage to an enemy target with Frozen or Frigid, increases the stability index ignored to 10 points and damage dealt by 30%.

keys.name: Additional Intelligence
keys.description: When the active skill <hl>Cold Precision Shot</hl> results in a kill, gains <hl>1</hl> point of Confectance Index.

keys.name: Iced with Milk Foam
keys.description: Gain <hl>3 points</hl> of Confectance Index at the start of the battle.

keys.name: Indomitable Lone Wolf
keys.description: After using the active skill <hl>Professional Tactics</hl>, if there are no other allied units within <hl>3 tiles</hl>, gains <hl>1 stack</hl> of <ef>Lone Wolf</ef>.

keys.name: Time for a Break
keys.description: When using <hl>Lone Wolf Territory</hl>, <hl>Cold Precision</hl>, or <hl>Professional Tactics</hl> over a <el freeze>Freeze</el> tile, cleanses all <el freeze>Freeze</el> debuffs from self and gains <hl>3 tiles</hl> of <ef>Additional Movement</ef>.

keys.name: Heated Caramel
keys.description: At the start of the battle, applies <ef>Murderous Intent</ef> to the enemy unit with the highest HP.

keys.name: Absolute Concentration
keys.description: Increases attack by <hl>10%</hl> at the start of the battle. This effect lasts until HP drops below <hl>100%</hl> for the first time.

keys.name: Survival Instinct
keys.description: At the start of the action, if own HP is greater than <hl>80%</hl>, reduces stability damage taken from attacks by <hl>2 points</hl>. This can trigger at most <hl>once</hl> per turn.

klukai.name: klukai
klukai.description: Klukai is a SSR Assault Rifle user that specialises in dealing AOE damage. She can easily breeze through majority of enemies.

basic_attack.name: swift_strike
basic_attack.description: Select 1 enemy target within <hl>8 tiles</hl> and deal Physical damage equal to <hl>80%</hl> of your attack power.

skill_1.name: pinpoint_detonation
skill_1.description:
Select 1 enemy target within <hl>8 tiles</hl> and deal AoE <el corrosion>Corrosion damage</el> equal to <hl80%</hl> of your attack power. Additionally, perform an extra attack that deals AoE <el corrosion>Corrosion damage</el> equal to <hl>60%</hl> of your attack power to the target and all enemy targets within <hl>3 tiles</hl>, pulling all targets <hl>1 tile</hl> toward the center.
If any kill is made, the cooldown of your Ultimate <hl>Crushing Drift</hl> is reduced by <hl>1 turn</hl>, and you gain <hl>2 points</hl> of Confectance Index. If no kill is made, apply <hl>1 stack</hl> of <ef>Corrosive Infusion</ef> to the target, lasting <hl>2 turns</hl>.
skill_1.quote: Make use of everything on the battlefield, for better or worse.

levels.description: The first attack deals damage equal to 100% of your attack power. When performing the additional attack, for each stack of Corrosive Infusion on the target, the damage coefficient increases by 5%. If a weakness is generated, the attack ignores 15% of the target’s cover damage reduction.

skill_2.name: overpowering_corrosion
skill_2.description: Select <hl>1 tile</hl> within <hl>8 tiles</hl> and deal AoE <el corrosion>Corrosion damage</el> equal to <hl>90%</hl> of your attack power to all enemy targets within <hl>3 tiles</hl>, applying <ef>Toxic Infiltration</ef>, lasting <hl>2 turns</hl>. For targets already affected by <ef>Toxic Infiltration</ef>, damage is increased by <hl>15%</hl>.
skill_2.quote: To crush all action and will; that is true strength.

levels.description: For targets already affected by Toxic Infiltration, additional damage is increased to 30%. If the target does not die, it still triggers the Toxic Infiltration death effect. Toxic Infiltration also applies a new effect: at the end of the turn, the user applies Toxic Infiltration, lasting 2 turns, to all enemy units within 3 tiles that are not affected by Toxic Infiltration.

The effect range increases by 2 tiles, and the damage is increased to 110% of your attack power. The spread range of Toxic Infiltration increases by 1 tile, and the damage increases to 80% of your attack power. If the target has an Corrosion debuff, apply Toxic Infiltration to the target before the attack, lasting 2 turns. Toxic Infiltration has a new effect: when affected by the user's Active Skill, the target takes 30% more damage.

ultimate.name: devastating_drift
ultimate.description: Select <hl>1 tile</hl> within a cross-shaped area from <hl>4 to 8 tiles</hl>, drop to that tile, and deal AoE <el corrosion>Corrosion damage</el> equal to <hl>100%</hl> of your attack power to all enemy targets within a <hl>5-tile</hl> wide path, gaining <hl>6 tiles</hl> of <ef>Additional Movement</ef>. If <hl>2 or more</hl> targets are killed, you can use this skill again, up to <hl>1 time</hl>.
ultimate.quote: A fusion of weight and grace. A thunderous song of battle.

levels.description: Each enemy target hit increases damage by 10%, up to 50%. If the target is a boss, damage is directly increased by 50%. If 2 or more targets or a boss are hit, you can use this skill again. Before attacking, apply Defense Down II and Toxic Infiltration to the target, lasting 2 turns.

Ignores Cover damage reduction. The width increases by 2 tiles, and the target is inflicted with Terror, lasting 2 turns. After attacking, trigger the Corrosive Infusion effect for all enemy units on the field, as well as the death effect of Toxic Infiltration.

passive.name: elite's_pride
passive.description:
The user is immune to <ef>Control Effects</ef>. When performing an Active Skill that causes damage, apply <hl>1 stack</hl> of <ef>Corrosive Infusion</ef> to the target, lasting <hl>2 turns</hl>, and gain <hl>1 stack</hl> of <ef>Competitive Spirit</ef>.
When the user or other allies perform <el corrosion>Corrosion attacks<el>, the user gains <hl>1 point</hl> of Confectance Index for each damage dealt. Every <hl>3 points</hl> of Confectance Index reduces the cooldown of the Ultimate by <hl>1 turn</hl>.
passive.quote: Step by step, victory will be firmly within our grasp.

levels.description: At the start of combat, gain 3 stacks of Competitive Spirit. Other allies dealing Corrosion damage also grants 1 stack of Competitive Spirit to Klukay. The Competitive Spirit stack limit increases by 4 stacks. For every 3 points of Confectance Index, apply 1 additional stack of Corrosive Infusion to enemies who have Corrosive Infusion , and reduce the Ultimate's cooldown by 1 additional turn. Corrosive Infusion also has a new effect: when the user or other allies deal Corrosion damage, apply an additional stack of Corrosive Infusion to targets with Corrosive Infusion . The target’s defense is reduced by 1%, and the stack limit increases by 5 stacks.

keys.name: Deadly Entwine
keys.description: At the start of the turn, if there is only one enemy target, applies <hl>1 stack</hl> of <ef>Corrosive Infusion</ef> to them for <hl>2 turns</hl>. Additionally, gains <hl>2 points</hl> of Confectance Index.

keys.name: One Fell Swoop
keys.description: If the Ultimate skill <hl>Devastating Drift</hl> only hits <hl>1 target</hl>, increases the damage dealt by <hl>30%</hl>.

keys.name: No Mercy
keys.description: <ef>Corrosive Infusion</ef> gains a new effect, it increases damage to targets in Stability Break by <hl>15%</hl>.

keys.name: Strong Support
keys.description: For every Support Attack performed by other allied units, gains <hl>1 point</hl> of Confectance Index.

keys.name: Limit Break
keys.description: Reduces thhe width of the Ultimate skill <hl>Devastating Drift's</hl> effective area to <hl>3 tiles</hl>. For each tile reduced, increases damage dealt by <hl>10%</hl>.

keys.name: Moment of Doom
keys.description: After the unit(s) afflicted with <ef>Toxic Infiltration</ef> take damage from its effect and survive, they are inflicted with <hl>1 stack</hl> of <ef>Corrosive Infusion</ef> for <hl>2 turns</hl>.

keys.name: Murderous Return
keys.description: Attack Boost <hl>+5.0%</hl> At the start of the turn, if the user's Confectance Index is full, the next instance of AoE damage inflicted by an active attack is increased by <hl>10%.</hl>

centaureissi.name: centaureissi
centaureissi.description: Centaureissi is a SSR Assault Rifle user. Acting as a 2 in 1 unit, she strongly focuses on defense as well as healing and buffing nearby teammates.

basic_attack.name: cleaning_time
basic_attack.description: Selects 1 target within <hl>7 tiles</hl>, dealing physical damage equal to <hl>80%</hl> of attack.
basic_attack.quote: It's time for a thorough cleanupーlet's clear the battlefield of its grime.

skill_1.name: careful_hospitality
skill_1.description: Selects 1 enemy target within <hl>7 tiles</hl> and deals <hl>Burn damage</hl> equal to <hl>130%</hl> of attack to them. After attacking, restores HP equal to <hl>100%</hl> of attack to the nearest allied target (excluding the user) and gains <ef>Heat Recovery</ef>. If the enemy target is inflicted with <ef>Overburn</ef>, heals 1 additional allied target.
skill_1.quote: Providing warm and thoughtful service is all in a day's work for a maid.

levels.description: If the user has Heat Recovery, gain Thermal Cycling.

skill_2.name: zucchero's_special_drink
skill_2.description: Selects 1 allied target within <hl>7 tiles</hl>, restoring total HP equal to <hl>150%</hl> of attack to the target and all allied units within <hl>3 tiles</hl>. The healing is distributed evenly among all targets. Additionally, deals AoE physical damage equal to <hl>50%</hl> of attack to all enemies within range. If the enemy targets have <ef>Overburn</ef>, cleanses <hl>2</hl> of their buffs.
skill_2.quote: A classic signature cocktail is key to keeping customers coming back.

levels.description: Each allied target restores at least 75% of Centaureissi's attack as HP.

ultimate.name: afternoon_tea_break
ultimate.description: Restores HP equal to <hl>100%</hl> of attack to all allies, cleanses <hl>2</hl> debuffs, removes <ef>Fear</ef> and <ef>Stun</ef>, and restores up to <hl>7 points</hl> of stability index to the ally with the lowest stability index. After healing, applies <ef>Heat Recovery</ef>.
ultimate.quote: The sunlight is most pleasant in the afternoon; don't miss the opportune time for tea.

levels.description: The number of debuffs cleansed increases by 1, and removes Taunt, Fear, Infatuated and Stun.
The number of debuffs cleansed increases by 1, and removes Taunt, Fear, Infatuated and Stun. Restore stability index for 2 allies with the lowest stability, then further increase it by 1 point.

passive.name: maid's_duty
passive.description: At the start of the battle, gains <ef>Heat Recovery</ef>. When the user is under the effects of <ef>Heat Recovery</ef>: Increases damage dealt by <hl>20%</hl>. When healing, additionally heals <hl>10%</hl> of the user's max HP. After active attacks, applies <ef>Overburn</ef> for <hl>2 turns</hl>. When an enemy unit within range receives targeted damage from an ally, prioritize performing <hl>1 instance</hl> of <ef>Action Support</ef>, dealing physical damage equal to <hl>80%</hl> of attack and <hl>3 points</hl> of stability damage to them, and applies <ef>Heat Recovery</ef> to the allied unit. Gains <hl>1 point</hl> of Confectance Index. This can be triggered up to <hl>2 times</hl> per turn.
passive.quote: It's a maid's duty to maintain the peace of the café.

levels.description: When Action Support is triggered, additionally applies Blazing Assault II and Damage Up II to the allied unit for 1 turn.

When Action Support is triggered, additionally applies Blazing Assault II and Damage Up II to the allied unit for 1 turn. When Heat Recovery is active: Increases healing by 20% and damage dealt by 40%. If the healing target has Heat Recovery, the healing increase is raised to 50%; if the attack target has Overburn, the damage dealt is increased by 50%.

keys.name: Pre-Meal Dessert
keys.description: Gains <hl>3 points</hl> of Confectance Index at the start of the battle.

keys.name: Maid's Resolve
keys.description: If an allied unit within <hl>7 tiles</hl> enters Stability Break after taking damage, removes <ef>Heat Recovery</ef> from self and applies <ef>Heat Recovery</ef> to allied unit.

keys.name: Efficient Processing
keys.description: When <ef>Heat Recovery</ef> is triggered, randomly cleanses <hl>1</hl> buff from the attacker. Before <ef>Heat Recovery</ef> is triggered, cleanses <hl>2</hl> debuffs from Centaureissi.

keys.name: Comforting Blend
keys.description: Increases the healing multiplier of the active skill <hl>Zucchero's Special Drink</hl> <hl>75%</hl>.

keys.name: Thorough Preparation
keys.description: When healing an allied target with an active skill, cleanses <hl>1</hl> debuff. For targets with <ef>Heat Recovery</ef>, cleanses <hl>1</hl> additional debuff.

keys.name: Lucky Menu
keys.description: When healing an allied target with an active skill, if the target has <ef>Heat Recovery</ef>, randomly applies <hl>1</hl> powerful buff to them for <hl>1 turn</hl>.

keys.name: Essential Hot Beverages
keys.description: Health Boost +5.0%. At the end of action, applies <ef>Heat Recovery</ef> to the closest allied unit without <ef>Heat Recovery</ef>. This effect has a <hl>2-turn</hl> cooldown.

daiyan.name: daiyan
daiyan.description: Daiyan is a SSR Assault Rifle user known for her high-mobility damage dealing, while providing stability shred and buff dispelling.

basic_attack.name: plucking_strings
basic_attack.description: Selects 1 enemy target within <hl>6 tiles</hl> and deals physical damage equal to <hl>80%</hl> of attack to them.

skill_1.name: absolute_tuning
skill_1.description: Selects 1 enemy target within <hl>6 tiles</hl>, cleanses <hl>1</hl> buff, and deals physical damage equal to <hl>150%</hl> of attack to them.
skill_1.quote: The strength of thousands, woven into one powerful melody.

levels.description: If the target has no buffs to cleanse when during the attack, gain 1 stack of Tuning after the attack.

skill_2.name: qing_shang_harmony
skill_2.description: Gains <hl>3 stacks</hl> of <ef>Tuning</ef>, as well as <ef>Pitch Perfect</ef> for <hl>1 turn</hl>. Gains <hl>1 instance</hl> of <ef>Extra Command</ef>.
skill_2.quote: Why not take this chance to play one more melody?

levels.description: Increases the number of Tuning stacks gained by 3.

ultimate.name: ethereal_resonance
ultimate.description: Selects 1 enemy target within <hl>6 tiles</hl>, dealing Physical damage equal to <hl>190%</hl> of attack. For every <hl>1 stack</hl> of <ef>Tuning</ef>, reduces this skill's cooldownn by <hl>1 turn</hl>. After attacking, consumes all stacks of <ef>Tuning</ef> and gains <hl>1 stack</hl> of <ef>Tuning</ef> permanently, up to a maximum of <hl>3 stacks</hl>.
ultimate.quote: This melody is most exquisite, but its message has to be clear.

levels.description: Increase the stack limit of permanent Tuning by 3 stacks.
Increase the stack limit of permanent Tuning by 3 stacks. For every 1 enemy unit that dies on the field, gain 1 stack of Tuning permanently.

passive.name: swift_harmony
passive.description: At the start of the action, gains <hl>1 point</hl> of Confectance Index and <hl>1 stack</hl> of <ef>Tuning</ef>. When performing an active attack against a target not protected by Cover, gains <hl>1 point</hl> of Confectance Index. Before taking targeted damage, if the number of <ef>Tuning</ef> stacks is greater than <hl>2</hl>, launches <ef>Interception</ef>, dealing light ammo Physical damage equal to <hl>150%</hl> of attack and <hl>4 points</hl> of stability damage, and permanently gains <hl>1 stack</hl> of <ef>Tuning</ef>. This can be triggered <hl>once</hl> per turn. If the number of <ef>Tuning</ef> stacks is greater than <hl>3</hl>, increases damage dealt by <hl>20%</hl>.
passive.quote: As the zither strings resonate, they never lose the rhythm.

levels.description: If the number of Tuning stacks is greater than 5, increases damage dealt by 40% instead, and stability damage dealt to the attacker before taking targeted damage increases by 2 points. The initial damage multiplier increases by 30%.

If the number of Tuning stacks is greater than 5, increases damage dealt by 40% instead, and stability damage dealt to the attacker before taking targeted damage increases by 2 points. The initial damage multiplier increases by 30%. When the number of permanent Tuning stacks reaches max, ignores 15% of Cover damage reduction when attacking Exposed enemies.

keys.name: Echoing Melody
keys.description: When Daiyan has <ef>Tuning</ef>, increases mobility by <hl>1 tile</hl>.

keys.name: Unfulfilled Dreams
keys.description: Gains <hl>3 points</hl> of Confectance Index at the start of the battle.

keys.name: Hazewalker's Melody
keys.description: For <hl>each point</hl> of additional mobility before the attack, critical rate increases by <hl>10%</hl>.

keys.name: Serene Serenade
keys.description: If Daiyan's mobility is higher than the target's, gains <hl>1 stack</hl> of <ef>Tuning</ef> before using an active attack.

keys.name: Squad Broken
keys.description: For every <hl>3 stacks</hl> of <ef>Tuning</ef>, cleanses <hl>1</hl> additional buff when using the active skill <hl>Absolute Tuning</hl>.

keys.name: Lasting Legacy
keys.description: After using <hl>Qing Shang Harmony</hl>, if a kill occurs in this turn, recovers <hl>20%</hl> max HP and <hl>2 points</hl> of stability index.

keys.name: Shattering Stone and Silk
keys.description:
Crit Rate +5.0%
At the start of the action, gains Movement Up I for 1 turn. This has a cooldown of 1 turn.
